messages.message: Also ‘smart’ text selection for phone numbers and addesses

I wonder if they fixed the spell check.
It always recommends the same misspelling I typed in instead of searching Google for it.
They also added autofill APIs for password manager apps like 1Password and LastPass

I wish I could stop using apps all together.

Maybe one day, but web apps are always slower than native.
Too much latency and overhead sending stuff in packets

It’s a tiny, tiny difference, but noticeable to freaks like me

Oh man.  Angular and React are the most amazing platforms ever invented.  You can compile 300MB of libraries and functionality in to 100KB single file for over the wire.

almost 2 seconds to install and app.  That's it.
